long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction:

Simple Youtube SubTitle is a Chrome browser extension designed specifically for English learners to provide a convenient tool for synchronizing YouTube subtitles. The subtitles scroll in real-time with the video, helping users better understand English content.

Core Features:

Real-time Subtitles: Subtitles scroll in real-time synchronization with the video.
Multi-language Support: Users can select the languages supported that the video provided.
Subtitle Following: When the user clicks text jumping to the corresponding position of video. (optional).
Playback Control: Pause the subtitles when the mouse moves over the subtitle area (optional).

Privacy Policy:

Simple Youtube SubTitle respects user privacy and does not collect or store any personal data. We are committed to protecting your privacy and security.

Any quetions please contact with the email (humbass@gmail.com),  thank you.
